articles.author: Sergiu Gatlan
articles.title: Apple fixes first zero-day bug exploited in attacks this year - BleepingComputer
articles.description: Apple released security updates to address this year's first zero-day vulnerability exploited in attacks that could impact iPhones, Macs, and Apple TVs.
articles.content:
Apple released security updates to address this year's first zero-day vulnerability exploited in attacks that could impact iPhones, Macs, and Apple TVs.
The zero-day fixed today is tracked as CVE-20… [+1942 chars]

articles.author: Trevor Mogg
articles.title: Gorgeous images show Axiom-3 crew over Himalayas on ISS approach - Digital Trends
articles.description: Astronauts aboard the ISS have shared dramatic imagery of the Axiom-3 Crew Dragon as it approached the station on Saturday.
articles.content:
A SpaceX Crew Dragon approaching the ISS in the Axiom-3 mission.NASA
